item.title: Master Product Manager (Level 7)
item.description: Stash the changes in a dirty working directory away with git stash.

item.title: Tree Trimmer (Level 5)
item.description: Rewrite branches with git filter-branch

item.title: Apprentice Butcher (Level 2)
item.description: Performed an interactive rebase using git rebase -i.

item.title: Master Historian (Level 10)
item.description: Investigate the commit log using git log.

item.title: Master Collector (Level 7)
item.description: Fetches named heads or tags from another repository with git fetch

item.title: Chimney Sweeper (Level 5)
item.description: Used git gc to run a number of housekeeping tasks on the current repository.

item.title: Master Archivist (Level 7)
item.description: Prepare each commit with its patch in one file per commit with git format-patch

item.title: Product Manager (Level 6)
item.description: Stash the changes in a dirty working directory away with git stash.

item.title: Master Fisherman (Level 10)
item.description: Look for specified patterns in the current repository with git grep.

item.title: Apprentice Butcher (Level 1)
item.description: Performed an interactive rebase using git rebase -i.

item.title: Architect (Level 6)
item.description: Created a new repository with git init.

item.title: Chimney Sweeper (Level 4)
item.description: Used git gc to run a number of housekeeping tasks on the current repository.

item.title: Master Stone Mason (Level 11)
item.description: Added files to the index area for inclusion in the next commit with git add

item.title: Master Banker (Level 7)
item.description: Join two or more development histories together with git merge.

item.title: Thug (Level 5)
item.description: Forced pushed a branch with git push -f

item.title: Master Socialite (Level 10)
item.description: pushed a branch to a remote repository using git push

item.title: Tree Trimmer (Level 4)
item.description: Rewrite branches with git filter-branch

item.title: Investigator (Level 6)
item.description: Used git blame to annotate a file with information about how each line changed.

item.title: Master Seamstress (Level 8)
item.description: amended a commit with git commit --amend.

item.title: Master Blacksmith (Level 7)
item.description: Created a branch using git checkout -b.
